entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
